RuleBusinessDescription: Gross Weight for ZFER is derived from Net Weight plus Packaging. Gross weight should be between 100 - 120% of Net weight and both should not be same.
Gross Weight for ZHAW is derived from Net Weight plus Packaging. Gross weight should be between 100 - 120% of Net weight and both should not be same.
Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZERS materials
Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZFER materials
Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZROH materials
Materials that have sales views need an entry in Account Assignment Group MVKE-KTGRM
Materials with procurement type F AND X needs purchasing view
Check for duplicate materials based on unique Manufacturer Part Number across all buying material types
Check for duplicate materials based on unique Manufacturer Part Number across all buying material types
Industry sector is always A (Plant engin./construction) for all material types
Weight Unit for ZFER materials is always KG (Kilogram)
Division is always 01  for all material types in UNICA when Sales View is created
Transportation group is always 0001 for ZFER materials
Transportation group is always 0001 for ZHAL materials
Transportation group is always 0001 for ZHAW materials
Transportation group is always 0001 for ZVER materials
Transportation group is always 0001 for ZROH materials
Search Term 1 of 3rd Party and Ship-To BP's should have format: first 5 characters of the name_first 5 characters of the city (skipping special characters and spaces)
IP vendors (account group Y005) should have NO assignment to a Company Code
Search for similar name data
Standard duplicate check on 3rd Party Business Partners  (Address)
Search for identical bank account data (Combination of Bank Country, Bank Key & Bank Acc or IBAN)
Vendor company code payment terms and purchase organization payment terms should be identical
List discrepancies between different purchase organization payment terms for the same vendor.
Customer company code payment terms and Sales Org. payment terms are identical
List discrepancies between different sales organization payment terms for the same customer.
Each Ship-To customer (account group Y002) must be assigned to at least 1 Sold-To customer.
Each Sold-To and Ship-To customer (account groups Y001 and Y002) should be assigned to at least 1 Sales Organisation
Customer record with account group Y002 (Ship-To) should not have Company Code data
Search for identical tax / VAT numbers
Search for identical telephone numbers
Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZFER materials
All IC vendors in Europe must have Payment term L017 as agreed Leviat intercompany term in both purchasing and company code view, else L020
All IC customers in Europe must have Payment term L017 as agreed Leviat intercompany term in both sales and company code view, else L020
LFM1-KALSK should be filled with code TP (external vendor pricing)
Commodity codes (MARC-STAWN) should not be empty.
If country of origin is not equal to country of the company code then Cash Management group is A2 and else A1
Commodity codes (MARC-STAWN) should not be empty.
if MVKE-LVORM is marked for all active sales org's and if MARC-LVORM for all active plants is marked as well, but there is NO block on MARA-LVORM, then give result.
X-plant material status (MARA-MSTAE) is 70 for all materials marked for deletion.
For ZHAW materials the Country of Origin should be identical in all active Plants
For ZHAW materials the first 6 digits of the Commodity code should be identical in all active Plants
Check if used payment term is a Leviat payment term
Check if used payment term is a Leviat payment term
ZHAW materials always have Procurement type F maintained. Only If the “special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL)” is used, than the procurement key should be E
Check on EU Business Partners without VAT number maintained
Check on EU Business Partners without VAT number maintained
General Item Category Group is always NORM for ZHAW materials
Italian Business Partners with Natural Person indicator should have Tax code 1 maintained (excluding Employee vendors)
If country of customer is US, CA, BR, MX, AU, IT, IE or GB the regions field should have a value (part of address print)
if KNB1-LVORM is marked for all active company codes and if KNVV-LVORM for all active sales org's is marked as well, but there is NO block on KNA1-LVORM, then give result.
if KNB1-LVORM is marked for all active company codes and if KNVV-LVORM for all active sales org's is marked as well, but there is NO block on KNA1-LVORM, then give result.
if LFB1-LVORM is marked for all active company codes and if LFM1-LVORM for all active purchase org's is marked as well, but there is NO block on LFA1-LVORM, then give result.
Material-related origin is always checked in Production Plants for ZROH materials
Material-related origin is always checked in Production Plants for ZHAL materials
If country of origin is not equal to country of the company code then Cash Management group is E3, else E2
All Intercompany customers have cash management group E4 maintained
Material should have an assignment to at least 1 Plant and/or Sales Org
Business Partners with central deletion flag should have DELETED, DUPLICATE, MERGED, CLOSED or DO NOT USE in Search Term 1
BP's without bank account data while all possible payment methods require a bank account
BP's without bank account data while all possible payment methods require a bank account
Field Collect. auth. marked when bank account then payment method F
Field Collect. auth. marked when bank account then payment method F
This checkbox should be defaulted marked in each Sales Org
This checkbox should be defaulted marked in each Sales Org
Check if email is entered in correct format in all BP groups
When Title Mr. or Mrs. is used, the gender of the employee cannot be Unknown
Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZHAW materials
Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZVER materials
